description: Mobile techniques used by PJApps, ATT&CK software S0291 v1.1
name: PJApps (S0291)

techniques.comment: PJApps has the capability to collect and leak the victim's location.
PJApps has the capability to send messages to premium SMS messages.
PJApps has the capability to collect and leak the victim's phone number, mobile device unique identifier (IMEI).
